item.description:
http://www.meetup.com/Yoga-With-Tobi/events/96482492/

Namaste,


 Are you living a good life but know somehow it could be better?

 Is there something important you’d like to do, but life is so jam-packed with mundane tasks that you never get to it?

 Do you wish you could be selfish in this pursuit and not feel guilty about it?


If you’re nodding your head “yes”, then this seminar is for you.

I hope you will join me in this inspiring seminar where I offer you the space and support to look at what’s important to you and the tools and techniques that put your priorities on the front burner!


During this FREE Teleseminar YOU WILL DISCOVER:


 A Unique Definition of Empowerment.

 A New Awareness of your Current Habits.

 3 Ways to Move towards a MORE SATISFYING LIFE.

How to get this Seminar FREE!


There is an access fee of $10 to cover the cost of the Teleconference line. However if you do these 2 things, it will be free for you!


1. Register at http://www.meetup.com/Yoga-With-Tobi/events/96482492/

2. "Like" Yoga with Tobi at http://www.facebook.com/YogaHeals

And... Once I receive your registration and see you on the Yoga with Tobi page, you will receive an e-mail with the phone # and access code for the Teleseminar!


Thank you!


Namaste, Tobi
item.how_to_find_us: You will be in your comfortable home!
item.name: FREE Teleseminar - "Pathways to Empowerment"
